title: University applicants in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of university applicants has decreased over the Year.
Number of university applicants is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, and finally slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Number of university applicants, of value 668150.0 was reached at Year 2011
Minimum Number of university applicants about 616700.0 was reached at Year 2012
min_summary: In general Number of university applicants has stayed the same over the Year.
